Title: Pokémon the Movie: Volcanion and the Mechanical Marvel
Writer: James Carter Cathcart (english adaptation), Junichi Masuda (created by), Ken Sugimori (created by), Satoshi Tajiri (created by), Atsuhiro Tomioka
Actors: James Carter Cathcart, Daniel J. Edwards, Kiyotaka Furushima, Megumi Hayashibara
Plot: A mystical Pokémon by the name of Volcanion must accept Ash's help to rescue the Azoth Kingdom.
